LanguageData.VGE_TargetingTerminal.label: targeting terminal
LanguageData.VGE_TargetingTerminal.description: A control station dedicated to operating a single gravship artillery piece. Requires a crew member to manually aim and fire the weapon. It draws power directly from the grav engine.
LanguageData.VGE_PointDefenseTurret.label: point defense turret
LanguageData.VGE_PointDefenseTurret.description: A specialized defensive turret built exclusively for gravships. It intercepts explosive projectiles and incoming drop pods within its protective radius, but cannot engage ground targets. Interception chance scales with the target’s velocity.
LanguageData.VGE_Gun_PointDefense.label: point defense gun
LanguageData.VGE_Gun_PointDefense.description: A rapid-fire gun for point-defense applications.
LanguageData.VGE_AmmoBox_GaussShell.label: gauss shell ammo box
LanguageData.VGE_AmmoBox_GaussShell.description: A small-sized box containing large uranium shells. Used by different gauss artillery turrets to reload. A box is fed directly into an adjacent gravship artillery when it needs to be reloaded.
LanguageData.VGE_AmmoBox_GaussShell_Blueprint.label: gauss shell ammo box (blueprint)
LanguageData.VGE_AmmoBox_GaussShell_Frame.label: gauss shell ammo box (building)
LanguageData.VGE_AmmoBox_GaussShell_Frame.description: A small-sized box containing large uranium shells. Used by different gauss artillery turrets to reload. A box is fed directly into an adjacent gravship artillery when it needs to be reloaded.
LanguageData.VGE_GaussGun.label: gauss gun
LanguageData.VGE_GaussGun.description: A small, single-barrel electromagnetic cannon that launches dense uranium slugs at extreme velocities. Designed for both local bombardments and medium-range engagements, it can also target other gravships in orbit. Requires a linked targeting terminal with an operator to function. It draws power directly from the grav engine.
LanguageData.VGE_Gun_GaussGun.label: gauss gun
LanguageData.VGE_Bullet_GaussGun.label: Gauss gun shot
LanguageData.VGE_JavelinPod.label: javelin pod
LanguageData.VGE_JavelinPod.description: A compact multi-tube missile platform that launches a volley of six guided astrofuel javelins. Meant for fast, hard-hitting strikes against exposed gravships and unarmored surface forces. Requires a linked targeting terminal with an operator to function. It draws power directly from the grav engine.
LanguageData.VGE_Gun_JavelinPod.label: javelin pod
LanguageData.VGE_Rocket_JavelinRocket.label: Javelin rocket
LanguageData.VGE_AnticraftCaster.label: anticraft caster
LanguageData.VGE_AnticraftCaster.description: A medium gravship-mounted energy weapon that fires short, razor-sharp bursts of cutting beam with surgical precision. Built to punch holes through critical systems, the caster trades sustained suppression for rapid, accurate strikes. Requires a linked targeting terminal with an operator to function. Uses a lot of power to fire.
LanguageData.VGE_Gun_AnticraftCaster.label: anticraft caster
LanguageData.VGE_Bullet_AnticraftCaster.label: anticraft caster beam
